content.question: What is the price paid by consumers and the net price received by producers after the tax is paid?

choices.label: Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $11.00 $10.45
Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $11.00 $10.00
Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $10.45 $10.00
Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $10.45 $9.45
Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $10.00 $9.45

content.answer: Paid by Consumers Received by Producers $10.45 $9.45

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
